mapper.sql: article_id, article_title, article_content, article_author, publish_time, create_time, event_time, address, is_public
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_article WHERE to_date(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') < event_time AND event_time < to_date(#{endTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (is_public = true ${logicSymbol} 1=1) LIMIT #{length} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT FROM tb_article a, tb_tag_resource_map m WHERE m.tag_name = #{tagName} AND m.resource_id=a.article_id AND m.resource_type= 'tb_article' AND (is_public = true ${logicSymbol} 1=1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_article (article_id, article_title, article_content, article_author, publish_time, create_time, event_time, is_public, address) VALUES (#{article.articleId}, #{article.articleTitle}, #{article.articleContent}, #{article.articleAuthor}, #{article.articlePublishTime}, #{article.articleCreateTime}, to_date(#{article.eventTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{article.isPublic}, #{article.address});
